keywords.indexterm: Error: Could not create MSXML object

condition.title: Problem
condition.p: When running a transformation scenario that uses the MSXML 4.0 transformer, I receive an error that looks like this:Could not create the 'MSXML2.DOMDocument.4.0' object. Make sure that MSXML version 4.0 is correctly installed on the machine.

cause.title: Cause
cause.p: It is likely that the latest MSXML 4.0 service pack is not installed on your computer.

steps-informal.p: To fix this issue, go to the Microsoft website and get the latest MSXML 4.0 service pack.
